title: Novavax Covid Booster Wins US Emergency Authorization
author: Fiona Rutherford
cleaned_text: Prognosis Novavax Covid Booster Wins US Emergency Authorization - Pre-clinical data suggest dose helps ward off Covid variants - CEO says booster may win over those skeptical of mRNA shots [Novavax Inc.](https://www.bloomberg.com/quote/NVAX:US)'s Covid-19 booster for people 18 and older was authorized by US regulators, offering another option to those seeking protection ahead of a potential wave of cases this winter. The booster dose can be administered six months after completion of primary vaccination with an authorized or approved Covid-19 vaccine. Novavax's booster shot is also available in adults for whom an messenger RNA bivalent shot is not accessible or clinically appropriate. Have a confidential tip for our reporters?
